statements: DELETE FROM MachineLearningInsights WHERE id = 1 AND data_pattern = 'Classification';
DELETE FROM MachineLearningInsights WHERE data_distribution LIKE '%balanced%' AND id = 5;
DELETE FROM ML_Algorithms WHERE training_time > '1 day';
DELETE FROM ML_Algorithms WHERE model_type = 'Regression' AND accuracy < 0.80;
DELETE FROM Table1 WHERE column1 = 10 AND column2 = 'value';
DELETE FROM Table2 WHERE column3 = '2022-03-15' AND column2 = 5;
DELETE FROM data_patterns WHERE column_1 = 'value_1' AND column_3 = 123;
DELETE FROM data_distributions WHERE feature_1 = 'feature_x' AND label = 0;
DELETE FROM distributions WHERE category = 'class_A' AND value < 0.5;
